column2: CHAPTER VII.

column2: YOUR MONEY OR YOUR LIFE.

column2: The noise which was made by the shutting of the door aroused Tom and Sarah from their reverie, and they rose, and, having thanked the Chourineur for the information he had given them, the fellow went out, the wind blowing very strongly, and the rain falling in torrents.
